subject: Mathematics
title: Multiplication and Division Relationships
description: Interpret products of whole numbers, e.g., interpret 5 Ã— 7 as the total number of objects in 5 groups of 7 objects each.
cluster: Represent and solve problems involving multiplication and division

subject: Mathematics
title: Multiplication as Repeated Addition
description: Determine the total number of objects when equally-sized groups of objects are combined or arranged in arrays.

subject: Mathematics
title: Understanding Multiplication
description: Interpret products of whole numbers as the total number of objects in equal groups.

subject: Mathematics
title: Multiplication Concepts
description: Represent and solve problems involving multiplication and division using equal groups, arrays, and area models.

subject: Mathematics
title: Place Value Understanding
description: Recognize that in a multi-digit number, a digit in one place represents 10 times as much as it represents in the place to its right.
domain: Number and Operations in Base Ten

subject: Mathematics
title: Place Value Relationships
description: Interpret the value of each place-value position as 10 times the position to the right and as one-tenth the position to the left.

subject: English Language Arts
title: Reading Comprehension
description: Ask and answer questions to demonstrate understanding of a text, referring explicitly to the text as the basis for the answers.

subject: English Language Arts
title: Reading Comprehension Skills
description: Establish purpose for reading selected texts based upon content to enhance comprehension.

subject: Mathematics
title: Adding and Subtracting Fractions
description: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators by replacing given fractions with equivalent fractions with like denominators.
cluster: Use equivalent fractions as a strategy

subject: Mathematics
title: Fraction Operations
description: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators including mixed numbers by replacing given fractions with equivalent fractions.

subject: Mathematics
title: Multiplication Understanding
description: Interpret products of whole numbers as total number of objects in equal-size groups or as area/array models.

subject: Mathematics
title: Multiplication Concepts
description: Interpret products of whole numbers using equal groups, arrays, and area models to solve word problems.

subject: Mathematics
title: Multi-digit Place Value
description: Recognize that in a multi-digit number, a digit in any place represents 10 times as much as the same digit in the place to its right.
domain: Number and Operations in Base Ten

subject: Mathematics
title: Place Value Concepts
description: Recognize that in a multi-digit number, a digit represents 10 times the value of the same digit one place to the right.
domain: Number and Operations in Base Ten

subject: English Language Arts
title: Text Comprehension
description: Ask and answer questions to demonstrate understanding of a text, using the text as the basis for the answers.

subject: English Language Arts
title: Reading Comprehension
description: Read and demonstrate comprehension of fiction and nonfiction texts, using text details to support understanding.

subject: Mathematics
title: Fraction Addition and Subtraction
description: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators by replacing fractions with equivalent fractions having like denominators.

subject: Mathematics
title: Adding and Subtracting Fractions
description: Add and subtract fractions with unlike denominators including mixed numbers using equivalent fractions.

subject: Mathematics
title: Multiplication and Division
description: Interpret products of whole numbers and represent multiplication using equal groups, arrays, and area models.

subject: Mathematics
title: Place Value Understanding
description: Recognize that in a multi-digit number, each digit represents 10 times the value of the same digit one place to the right.
domain: Number and Operations in Base Ten
